{{Wired embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=FreeAgent GoFlex TV |asin=B003IT6YFK |newegg=N82E16822148585 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=discontinued |est_release_date=09/2010 |type=media player |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTD1073;RTD1073MD; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG1S3ETA00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16DG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3.3V Stereo Audio DAC w/ Line Output;Cirrus;CS4353;;1;,,, 1MHz 3A PWM Buck DC/DC Converter;Global Mixed-Mode Technology;G5627;;1;,,, 1A 3.3V Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Taitron;LD1117A33;;1;,,, 1A 1.8V Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Taitron;LD1117A18;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.3, SPDIF out, Composite A/V, Component Video, RTC w/ battery, IR remote, heatsink |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} {{TagLine|HD Media Player}} :[https://www.seagate.com/support/home-entertainment/digital-media-players/goflex-tv/ Support page]
"Main Board: IM006-1006A-3D" is silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTD1073 @400MHz :Architecture: MIPS24Kc *RAM: 128MB (DDR2) *Storage: 256MB (SLC NAND), 1x SATA II *USB: 2x USB 2.0 *LAN: 1x FE (RJ45)
==Images== <gallery> File:Seagate FreeAgent GoFlex TV Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Seagate FreeAgent GoFlex TV Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
